title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Park Homes
purpose: To bring together parliamentarians, park homeowners and industry representatives to discuss issues of common interest including legislation and its enforcement to eliminate abuse and disadvantage.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 5808.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Debbie Walker, British Holiday and Home Parks Association
contact_details.secretariat: British Holiday and Home Parks Association acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.bhhpa.org.uk/
